force_password_reset.title: Force Password Reset
force_password_reset.description: Force users to reset their password on next login.
force_password_reset.reset_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to force all users to reset their password on next login?
force_password_reset.reset_all_success: All users will be forced to reset their password on next login.

reset_count.title: Reset Count
reset_count.description: The number of users who have successfully reset their password since the last time it was force required.

forum.force_reset_password_description: The site administrator has requested that you reset your password.
forum.new_password_must_be_different: Your new password must be different from your old password.
